metadata.synopsis: One of the hostages thanks you for saving them from the Iron Throne. One-liner dialog.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Speak to Featherweight Falson - S_GLO_IronThrone_Group2_Prisoner3 d4f52268-f641-406e-b725-0ebf31193693 - (34; 39; 70)  in the Dock warehouse after saving them.Quick setup:- Load CTY_Main_A- Use Debug Book (Ctrl + Shift + 9)- Set Quest Flags and Options -> Act3 (LOW) -> Iron Throne -> Change State -> Back At Docks -> MajoritySaved- Then talk to the NPC

0.speaker: Featherweight Falson
0.text: Featherweight Falson'll be back in the ring in no time - once my daughter Clore is freed.

1.speaker: Featherweight Falson
1.text: If I got me hands on the bastards that got Clore locked up - a quick one-two and BANG. Out like a light.
